StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: UPDATEASSOCIATELECTURER
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.UPDATEASSOCIATELECTURER(pIDPerson IN NUMBER, pFirstName IN VARCHAR2, pSurname IN VARCHAR2,&lt;br/&gt;pTitle IN VARCHAR2, pAddress IN VARCHAR2, pPhone IN NUMBER, pPostcode IN NUMBER, pCampusLocation IN VARCHAR2, pIdBuilding IN VARCHAR2,&lt;br/&gt;pNumberOffice IN VARCHAR2, pStaffType IN VARCHAR2, pArea IN VARCHAR2, pLecturerType IN VARCHAR2, pNumberHours IN NUMBER, pYearJoin IN NUMBER) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN &lt;br/&gt; UPDATE AssociateLecturer_table lecA&lt;br/&gt; SET lecA.surname = pSurname,&lt;br/&gt; lecA.firstName = pFirstName,&lt;br/&gt; lecA.title = pTitle,&lt;br/&gt; lecA.address = pAddress,&lt;br/&gt; lecA.phone = pPhone,&lt;br/&gt; lecA.postcode = pPostcode,&lt;br/&gt; lecA.campusLocation = pCampusLocation,&lt;br/&gt; lecA.idBuilding = pIdBuilding,&lt;br/&gt; lecA.numberOffice = pNumberOffice,&lt;br/&gt; lecA.staffType = pStaffType,&lt;br/&gt; lecA.area = pArea,&lt;br/&gt; lecA.lectureType = pLecturerType,&lt;br/&gt; lecA.numberHonours = pNumberHours,&lt;br/&gt; lecA.yearJoin = pYearJoin&lt;br/&gt; WHERE lecA.idPerson = pIDPerson;&lt;br/&gt;END updateAssociateLecturer;
